channel.title: Posts on Aria Ghora's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aria Ghora's Blog

item.title: Noe now supports multidimensional indexing
item.description: Some progress I got there. Noe now supports mutidimensional indexing. See following examples:

item.title: I am implementing ndarray in pascal
item.description: I love pascal. But I also love numpy's ndarray. Most of my project coded in python will most likely use numpy. There is no good solution (at least to me) for realizing ndarray functionality in pascal. Thus, I am trying to implement one on my own (here). So be it. Meet noe I am not trying to be pretentious by competing with numpy. Heck, nobody is trying to compete with numpy.

item.title: Hello fellow mortals. I started a blog.
item.description: I know that blogging takes time. I know that it is not easy to stay committed to writing. Nonetheless, I feel something missing if I have no personal development blog, as I am involved in many projects, as well as my personal projects. Furthermore, writing what I've learned tends to make me understand them better. Scope of my blog I want to stay focused and relevant. Software development and machine learning are my strong suit (I mean, relatively stronger than any others of mine).
